005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldDefinition;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.AbstractDefinitionTargetedConstraints;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013
014/**
015 * A set of constraints targeting a {@link IFieldDefinition} based on a target
016 * Metapath expression.
017 *
018 * @see #getTargetExpression()
019 */
020public class FieldTargetedConstraints
021    extends AbstractDefinitionTargetedConstraints<IFieldDefinition, IValueConstrained> {
022
023  /**
024   * Construct a new set of targeted constraints.
025   *
026   * @param source
027   *          information about the resource the constraints were sources from
028   * @param target
029   *          the Metapath expression that can be used to find matching targets
030   * @param constraints
031   *          the constraints to apply to matching targets
032   */
033  public FieldTargetedConstraints(
034      @NonNull ISource source,
035      @NonNull String target,
036      @NonNull IValueConstrained constraints) {
037    super(source, target, constraints);
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  public void target(@NonNull IFieldDefinition definition) {
042    applyTo(definition);
043  }
044}
